verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Here I stand forever in Your Mighty Hand Living with Your promise written on my heart I am Yours Surrendered wholly to You You set me in Your family Calling me Your own{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Now I, I belong to You, all I need Your Spirit, Your Word, Your Truth Hear my cry My deep desire, to know You more In Your Name I will lift my hands to the King This anthem of praise I bring Heaven knows, I long to love you With all I am, I belong to You{/lang-eng}
